entries.MST_CATEGORY_10000_DESC: While traveling in Grand Gaia, cooperating with friends and with a powerful goddess, a Summoner faces off against demons in fierce battles.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_10001_DESC: The Summoner arrives to Ishgria, the land of the sealed demons. Grahdens, who had been waiting there for some time, mentions he has a new assistant...
entries.MST_CATEGORY_10201_DESC: After facing the War Demon Shusui, the Summoner reaches Lem, the second region of Ishgria. What could be awaiting the Summoner in this new land?
entries.MST_CATEGORY_10202_DESC: After meeting up with Seria and Lugina, the Summoner travels beyond Lem towards Beiorg, at Tilith's request.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_10203_DESC: Wulgee is Ishgria's eastern region which houses giant miasma-emitting flowers. The Summoners survey this land hoping to learn what's become of Karl.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_10204_DESC: Mordlim, the demon ruler of Rakshult, is interested in both otherworldly and human-made techniques. Many unusual structures can be found in this land.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_10205_DESC: The great giant's corpse draws the eye where it rests on Zamburg's cliffs. It is said that the ruler of this land, Amu Yunos, is the oldest demon.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_10206_DESC: Fal Nerga, a land ruled by a demon with the power of a dragon. The Summoner's friends await in this place where shadows of lost prosperity remain.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_10207_DESC: Estria, the land the Summoners followed Mora to. It is said this land was once home to the oldest nation founded by demons.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_20000_DESC: The Summoner is asked to venture into a newly discovered and mysterious land. However, the enemies waiting there prove a lot stronger than imagined...
entries.MST_CATEGORY_20001_DESC: A demonic "shadow" found in one of Ishgria's regions. Why would demons create such a thing? And what is the purpose of these "shadows"?
entries.MST_CATEGORY_30000_DESC: The Arena is a place where Summoners can use their skills to earn a rank promotion. Nonetheless, there are those who don't take it very seriously...
entries.MST_CATEGORY_40000_DESC: Many demons have been appearing recently, so the ban on Demon Slayer missions has been lifted. Summoners can now challenge the strongest opponents!
entries.MST_CATEGORY_50000_DESC: It is said that the Grand Quest System built by the Akras Summoners' Hall Survey Office allows one to experience the same adventure in numerous ways.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_50100_DESC: The Grand Quest System allows Summoners to relive any adventures already experienced in different lands, facing off against gods and demons alike...
entries.MST_CATEGORY_50200_DESC: The Grand Quest System grants Summoners the opportunity to go on adventures with ancient heroes, helping to reveal history's most famous mysteries...
entries.MST_CATEGORY_50300_DESC: Thinking of their friends' current dilemma, Grahdens asks the Summoner to defeat a certain demon. However, three beings from another world appear...
entries.MST_CATEGORY_51000_DESC: Karl asks the Summoner for some help with defeating a certain dragon. This particular beast is quick to flee, so they try a pincer attack, but...
entries.MST_CATEGORY_51001_DESC: Lugina and the Summoner search for the Empress's treasure hidden within the Great Tree of Life. However, Paris is also after the treasure herself.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_51002_DESC: Seria and Karl ask the Summoner for help with defeating the demon Graham. However, Graham has several traps in store for them...
entries.MST_CATEGORY_51003_DESC: After learning of the demon Algmos's sighting, Seria ignores orders from Summoners' Hall and pursues the demon. Now the Summoner must bring her back.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_51004_DESC: Grahdens asks the Summoner for help with defeating the demon Mashreed. However, a number of other demons seem to be lurking in the area as well...
entries.MST_CATEGORY_51005_DESC: Lin asks the Summoner for help with conducting some land surveys in a region connected to Grand Gaia. Lots of monsters start showing up though, and...
entries.MST_CATEGORY_51006_DESC: Paris visits a strange land upon Noel's request, and the Summoner goes in the same direction. Going their separate ways they run into unexpected foes.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_51007_DESC: Lugina and the Summoner set off to defeat a demon, all according to Noel's plan. However, Lugina is then forced to fight a demon that resembles him.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_51008_DESC: Elise, Lin, and Sera go to the mountains for a picnic when a demon appears. Noah and the Summoner must rescue them quickly, but...
entries.MST_CATEGORY_52000_DESC: Cardes the Malevolent invades the Kingdom of Palmyna. Princess Edea and her comrades, along with the Royal Army, fight until the very end, but...
entries.MST_CATEGORY_52001_DESC: Edea falls into a deep sleep in order to seal away Cardes. Having been transported to different regions, Edea's friends gather anew to save her.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_52002_DESC: Michele, who lives in the La Veda Republic, happens upon Duel-GX. Together, they set out on a journey to defeat Duel-GX's target, Melchio.
entries.MST_CATEGORY_52003_DESC: The Guardians of Meirith head to Ishgria to face a demon. But they hear of a threat to the Holy Emperor en route, and hurriedly split up...
